description: Michael Blaze makes a strong first impression as he gets friendly with the camera in his solo debut. This former culinary graduate turned open road trucker takes a moment from his travels to spend some quality time with our cameras, as he shows off what makes him the 'hottest thing on the road'. He teases his goods while flexing his toned and muscled physique, before revealing his stick shift and showing how he handles it, stroking himself for satisfaction and to put on a little show, before letting loose his virgin screen nut, jizzing all over himself in a messy conclusion to his first- but hopefully not last- shoot. Enjoy!
title: Michael Blaze
